description: Creates or updates a Systems Manager resource policy. A resource policy helps you to define the IAM entity (for example, an Amazon Web Services account) that can manage your Systems Manager resources. The following resources support Systems Manager resource policies.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to which you want to attach a policy.

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.description: A policy you want to associate with a resource.

nested_items.name: PolicyId
nested_items.description: The policy ID. To update a policy, you must specify PolicyId and PolicyHash.

nested_items.name: PolicyHash
nested_items.description: ID of the current policy version.
